cards.name: Fear
cards.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
cards.flavor:
"Even the bravest of warriors yet knows the dark clutch of fright upon his stalwart heart."
—Lim-Dûl the Necromancer

cards.name: Deluge
cards.text: Tap all creatures without flying.
cards.flavor:
"From the sea came all life, and to the sea it will return. The sooner the better."
—Emperor Aboshan

cards.name: Sea Monster
cards.text: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
cards.flavor: It's easy to believe the monster is a myth—until you feel three hundred thousand pounds of myth crashing down on your ship.

cards.name: Dusk Imp
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Imps are just intelligent enough to have an understanding of cruelty.

cards.name: Sky Weaver
cards.text: {2}: Target white or black creature gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
cards.flavor: "Let my wisdom give you wings."

cards.name: Bog Wraith
cards.text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
cards.flavor: Knowing Takenuma Swamp to be dangerous, Hisata set wards to warn him of predators. He never imagined that his murderer would pass through them unhindered.

cards.name: Cloud Sprite
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying.
cards.flavor: The delicate sprites carry messages for Saprazzans, but they refuse to land in Mercadia City's filthy markets.

cards.name: Icatian Priest
cards.text: {1}{W}{W}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Grelden knelt and felt the cool, dry hand of the priest on his brow. Hours later, when his wits returned, he was covered in his enemies' blood on the field of victory.

cards.name: Honor Guard
cards.text: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The strength of one. The courage of ten.

cards.name: Vesuvan Doppelganger
cards.text: You may have Vesuvan Doppelganger enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it doesn't copy that creature's color and it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have this creature become a copy of target creature, except it doesn't copy that creature's color and it has this ability."

cards.name: Ulvenwald Observer
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"I tell you, the trees were closing in! It's by the grace of the Heron alone that I made it out of the Ulvenwald!"
—Ricton, traveling merchant

cards.name: Soltari Monk
cards.text:
Protection from black
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
cards.flavor:
"Prayer rarely explains."
—Orim, Samite healer

cards.name: Blood Sun
cards.text:
When Blood Sun enters the battlefield, draw a card.
All lands lose all abilities except mana abilities.
cards.flavor: As the struggle raged for control of the Immortal Sun, the world grew dark under a blood-red sky.

cards.name: Culling Dais
cards.text:
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a charge counter on Culling Dais.
{1}, Sacrifice Culling Dais: Draw a card for each charge counter on Culling Dais.
cards.flavor:
"Forswear the flesh and you will truly see."
—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

cards.name: Rubblehulk
cards.text:
Rubblehulk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
Bloodrush — {1}{R}{G}, Discard Rubblehulk: Target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

cards.name: Shifting Loyalties
cards.text: Exchange control of two target permanents that share a card type. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, land, and planeswalker are card types.)
cards.flavor:
"Show the enemy the true path, and the spirit will yearn to follow it."
—Houn, Jeskai elder

cards.name: Spirit Shackle
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, put a -0/-2 counter on it.

cards.name: Wellgabber Apothecary
cards.text: {1}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target tapped Merfolk or Kithkin creature this turn.
cards.flavor: "You've discovered that boggarts bite, I see. And will the militia be chasing this lot? . . . Ah, you're staying in town to avoid Nath's hunt. Wise. Now this poultice . . ."

cards.name: Lust for War
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, Lust for War deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
Enchanted creature attacks each combat if able.

cards.name: Mindcrank
cards.text: Whenever an opponent loses life, that player mills that many cards. (Damage dealt by sources without infect causes loss of life.)
cards.flavor:
"Let go of your memories and be reborn."
—Argent Etchings, plate 106, passage 27

cards.name: Spirit of the Hunt
cards.text:
Flash
When Spirit of the Hunt enters the battlefield, each other creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The bonds of the pack transcend time and death.

cards.name: Fevered Visions
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, that player draws a card. If the player is your opponent and has four or more cards in hand, Fevered Visions deals 2 damage to that player.
cards.flavor: The mind can only expand so far before it flies apart.

cards.name: Frozen Aether
cards.text: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor: Gjornersen entertained his followers by taking bets on which would move first—the drowsing land wurm or the frozen goblins.

cards.name: Tormented Soul
cards.text: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.
cards.flavor: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

cards.name: Moonlight Bargain
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. For each card, put that card into your graveyard unless you pay 2 life. Then put the rest into your hand.
cards.flavor: At every fifth full moon, the Moon Market convenes to peddle Ravnica's most forbidden wares.

cards.name: Twinblade Assassins
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Rumors swirl of a pair of deadly Golgari assassins only known as the Left and Right Hands of Ochran.

cards.name: Savannah
cards.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)

cards.name: Dakmor Ghoul
cards.text: When Dakmor Ghoul enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"Cursed be the sickly forms that err from honest Nature's rule!"
—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, "Locksley Hall"

cards.name: Pacifism
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
cards.flavor: "Can't a fella get a moment's peace around here?"

cards.name: Cateran Summons
cards.text: Search your library for a Mercenary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Even when recruitment is slow, the guild can always cook something up.

cards.name: Ripjaw Raptor
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Ripjaw Raptor is dealt damage, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Raptors are clever enough to tear away a hard metal shell to get at the tasty morsel inside.

cards.name: Dimir Signet
cards.flavor: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.

cards.name: Back from the Brink
cards.text: Exile a creature card from your graveyard and pay its mana cost: Create a token that's a copy of that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
cards.flavor: On Innistrad, death is just a career change.

cards.name: Boros Signet
cards.flavor:
"Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."
—Agrus Kos

cards.name: Diminish
cards.text: Target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Everything seems a little less ferocious when it's running from a house cat.

cards.name: Erayo, Soratami Ascendant // Erayo's Essence
cards.text: Whenever an opponent casts their first spell each turn, counter that spell.

cards.name: Invigorate
cards.text:
If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life.
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

cards.name: Serum Visions
cards.text: Draw a card. Scry 2.

cards.name: Gathan Raiders
cards.text:
Hellbent — Gathan Raiders gets +2/+2 as long as you have no cards in hand.
Morph—Discard a card. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Angelic Purge
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent.
Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment.
cards.flavor: "We must save you from yourselves."

cards.name: Creeping Corrosion
cards.text: Destroy all artifacts.
cards.flavor:
"We will reveal the futility of their heresy by showing them how fragile their relics are."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

cards.name: Grimlock, Dinobot Leader // Grimlock, Ferocious King
cards.text:
Trample
{2}, Convert a Transformers toy you own to its other mode: Grimlock, Ferocious King becomes Grimlock, Dinobot Leader.
cards.flavor: "Why you think Grimlock stupid? Me not stupid. Grimlock smartest Dinobot."

cards.name: Tar Pitcher
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor:
"Auntie Grub had caught a goat, a bleating doe that still squirmed in her arms. At the same time, her warren decided to share with her a sensory greeting of hot tar . . . ."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

cards.name: Giant Killer // Chop Down
cards.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor: "What size advantage? They never even see me coming."

cards.name: Sliver Overlord
cards.text:
{3}: Search your library for a Sliver card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
{3}: Gain control of target Sliver. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
cards.flavor: The end of evolution.

cards.name: Tajuru Paragon
Xathrid Necromancer
cards.text: Whenever Xathrid Necromancer or another Human creature you control dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
cards.flavor: "My commands shall echo forever in their dusty skulls."

cards.name: Pirate's Cutlass
cards.text:
When Pirate's Cutlass enters the battlefield, attach it to target Pirate you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Divine Favor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
cards.flavor: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.

cards.name: Kingfisher
cards.text:
Flying
When Kingfisher dies, draw a card.
cards.flavor: It's tastiest when served with the fish it stole.

cards.name: Faerie Miscreant
cards.text:
Flying
When Faerie Miscreant enters the battlefield, if you control another creature named Faerie Miscreant, draw a card.
cards.flavor: One faerie distracts the judge while a second steals the law.

cards.name: Warped Devotion
cards.text: Whenever a permanent is returned to a player's hand, that player discards a card.
cards.flavor:
"Before the glory of Yawgmoth, yes, even this makes sense."
—Urza, to Gerrard

cards.name: Prismatic Lens
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor: It bends not light but mana, aligning its chaotic currents into the sharp angles necessary for the mystic's purposes.

cards.name: Reyhan, Last of the Abzan
cards.text:
Reyhan, Last of the Abzan enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever a creature you control dies or is put into the command zone, if it had one or more +1/+1 counters on it, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

cards.name: Bull Hippo
cards.text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
cards.flavor: The merfolk may rule the waters, but hippos have never had much respect for authority.

cards.name: Prophetic Bolt
cards.text: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to any target. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Gigantomancer
cards.text: {1}: Target creature you control has base power and toughness 7/7 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "All life is driven by an indomitable will to survive. I simply turn that into something more . . . tangible."

cards.name: Golgari Thug
cards.text:
When Golgari Thug dies, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
Dredge 4 (If you would draw a card, you may mill four cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

cards.name: Everglades
cards.text:
Everglades enters the battlefield tapped.
When Everglades enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Swamp you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {C}{B}.

cards.name: Nethroi, Apex of Death
cards.text:
Mutate {4}{G/W}{B}{B} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Deathtouch, lifelink
Whenever this creature mutates, return any number of target creature cards with total power 10 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Granite Gargoyle
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Granite Gargoyle gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"While most overworlders fortunately don't realize this, Gargoyles can be most delicious, providing you have the appropriate tools to carve them."
—The Underworld Cookbook, by Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar

cards.name: Righteous Confluence
cards.text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
• Exile target enchantment.
• You gain 5 life.

cards.name: Wit's End
cards.text: Target player discards their hand.
cards.flavor:
"Some images are so powerful that one glance burns them into your mind forever. Come, let us gaze on nothingness."
—Szadek

cards.name: Wit's End
cards.text: Target player discards their hand.
cards.flavor:
"Some images are so powerful that one glance burns them into your mind forever. Come, let us gaze on nothingness."
—Szadek

cards.name: Rageform
cards.text:
When Rageform enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach Rageform to it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
